profile.title: Front-End Developer (React / React Native)
profile.summary: Aspiring Software Developer experienced in building digital solutions using both traditional and low-code technologies. Currently working at Innovo Group as a Software Engineer focused on workflow automation using the Microsoft Power Platform. Previously worked on React Native frontend development, building reusable components, API-driven features, and managing application state with Redux. Passionate about automation, scalable systems, and user-focused design, with the goal of becoming a full-time React Engineer.

location.address: 18 Zo-Al Fakar St., Helwan, Cairo, Egypt 11735

description: Develop internal applications and automated workflows using Microsoft Power Apps and Power Automate.
Configure and maintain app logic, data connections, and automated flows aligned with business needs.
Collaborate with teams to analyze workflows and translate requirements into scalable solutions.
Provide user support and training to ensure smooth adoption of automation tools.
Troubleshoot flow errors, optimize performance, and apply best practices for reliability and security.
Work with IT to manage permissions and integrate Power Platform solutions with internal systems.
Developed cross-platform mobile applications using React Native with TypeScript.
Integrated RESTful APIs for dynamic content rendering.
Used Redux Toolkit for efficient global state management.
Built reusable UI components and responsive layouts.
Collaborated with senior developers to debug and enhance live applications.
Handled inbound and outbound calls for Amazon accounts.
Resolved customer issues related to orders and deliveries.
Maintained high customer satisfaction in a fast-paced environment.
Demonstrated strong communication and problem-solving skills.

education.institution: Modern Academy for Science and Technology
